title: Discovery : Explore the world of oil & gas (MAC & PC)
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Gas producers
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Oil well drilling
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Oil industry - History
description: Take a first hand look at the oil and gas industry in Australia. You can visit areas such as; offshore production platforms, onshore gas and oil fields, witness the end use of gas and oil products, oil and gas reserves, processing products at the refinery, see how natural gas is created and trapped in the earth, and visit AMOSC (Australian Oil Spill Centre). There's an historical overview, safety outline, and a chance to do some testing.
